CustomField.formula: CASE(Utility_Account_Subscription__r.Opportunity__r.Commission_Structure__r.Type__c, "Variable by kW", Utility_Account_Subscription__r.Opportunity__r.Commission_Structure__r.Cents_kW_DC_First_Bill_Paid__c * 1000 * Approved_Change_in_Subscription__c, "Fixed by Annual kWh", IF(ISPICKVAL(Type__c, "Initial"), 0, 0), 0 )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Estimated Commission owed to partner on First Bill Paid based on Approved Change in Subscription and Commission Rate specified on deal Commission Structure
CustomField.label: First Bill Paid Estimated Commission
